text:
- I'm starting to feel
like we should do a little

"American Ninja Warrior"
play-by-play right now.

- I'm already there.
- Come on, man, let's do it.
[upbeat jazzy music][
- Hey, hey, big man.

- Hey, Matt.
What's up, man?

How you doing?
You hanging in there?

- I--I just--this is when
we're normally doing

"American Ninja Warrior"
and now--
it'd be good to be energized.

I feel like I'm--
I'm getting out of shape.

- You know, dude,
it has been a while, man.

I feel rusty too.
You think we're rusty though?
- Oh, dude, I--
hey, look out the window.
You--you see what I see?

[ding-dong]
- Oh.
Yeah, that sun looks nice, man.

Yeah, it looks real nice.
- I tell you.

This doesn't
just look nice, Akbar.

That sun looks like it's moving
like it's on a mission!

- Matt, Look at the su--
she is going for the water--

normally a bad thing
on "Ninja Warrior,"

but this sun clearly
has other plans.

- She is moving at light speed.
Are you kidding me?
Literally.

I mean, this sun
has got some hustle!

- Look at her go.
There is no doubt.
This sun is a star!
- She's not just a star.
She is a superstar!
- Like Copernicus said,

this sun is the center
of our universe, big man.

- No wonder the ancient cultures
consider her a god.

- Well, she is burning
600 million tons

of hydrogen and helium
every second,
and you're feeling the burn!

- Matt, I can't believe
she's still going though.
Matt, she is still doing this.

She's going strong.
This is incredible.
What a performance by the Sun.

- But still needs
to finish it, Akbar.

Gotta get to that buzzer--
has to close it out,

officially bring us
to that sunset.

- Oh, Matt, she does it!
She does it!

- [laughing]
Oh!
Was there ever any doubt?

- Unless you're an 18th century
Scottish philosopher

like David Hume,
I don't think so.

- Akbar, this sun
is bringing your best,
and it's bringing my best.
I love watching this sun--
a performance for the ages.

- Matt, this is gonna
be tough to beat.

Up next, we're gonna see if the
Moon can top that performance.
That's a hard one.

- Good night, Sun.
Hello, Moon.

Up next on
"Celestial Ninja Warrior."

Oh.
- "Celestial Ninja Warrior"?

That felt good, man.
How's your throat feeling?
- Not bad.

Felt like I had a latte
washed down with sunshine.
